caption:
We hosted a community Backyard Asada right here in Austin, Texas, where our Siete Culinary Team cooked alongside a handful of talented chef friends, like Reyna Vazquez from Veracruz All Natural! 💗

Reyna co-founded @veracruztacos with her sister in 2008, combining the rich culinary lessons from her childhood with her own creativity to develop a unique and vibrant menu. From a young age, Reyna was immersed in the kitchen, learning the art of cooking from her mother, who ran a fondita in Veracruz, Mexico. This early exposure to authentic flavors and family recipes ignited a lifelong passion for food. And when it comes to grilling and cooking for backyard asadas, Reyna’s got some Hot Tips and sweet memories to share with you! 🔥

#sietefoods #grilling #backyardasada #backyardasadaseason #carneasada #atx
